snippet: A federal appeals court in San Francisco said that it would take up an Arizona case that stems from the state’s many immigration crackdowns from the past decade.
abstract: Federal appeals court in San Francisco says it will take up Arizona case that stems from state’s many immigration crackdowns from past decade.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court in San Francisco said that it would take up an Arizona case that stems from the state’s many immigration crackdowns from the past decade.

headline.main: Arizona: Appeals Court to Hear No-Bail Law
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Appeals Court to Hear No-Bail Law
